projects.title: HRMS System

projects.description: A full-featured task management application with real-time updates, project organization, and team collaboration.

projects.title: College Kart

projects.title: Healthcare App
projects.description: A healthcare management application featuring appointment booking, patient records, and doctor consultation.

projects.title: Jobby App
projects.description: A job search application with advanced filtering, job details, and application tracking features.

projects.title: Quiz App
projects.description: An interactive quiz application with multiple categories, timed questions, and score tracking.

projects.title: Food Website
projects.description: A responsive food ordering website with menu browsing, cart functionality, and order placement.

projects.title: Todo Wiz
projects.description: A simple yet elegant todo application with local storage persistence and task filtering.
